verses.verse: So these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>, because he was <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Then was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%>, of the <S%H4940>relatives<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram<s%>: against <S%H347>Job<s%> was his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%>, because he <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> rather than <S%H430>God<s%>.

Also against his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> was his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%>, because they had <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H4617>answer<s%>, and yet had <S%H7561>condemned<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>.
Now <S%H453>Elihu<s%> had <S%H2442>waited<s%> until <S%H347>Job<s%> had <S%H1697>spoken<s%>, because they were elder than <S%H2205>he<s%>.

When <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was no <S%H4617>answer<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, then his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>.

And <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H6810>young<s%>, and you are very <S%H3453>old<s%>; therefore I was <S%H2119>afraid<s%>, and <S%H3372>dared<s%> not <S%H2331>show<s%> you my <S%H1843>opinion<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3117>Days<s%> should <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> should <S%H3045>teach<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
<S%H403>But<s%> there is a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in <S%H582>man<s%>: and the <S%H5397>inspiration<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> gives them <S%H995>understanding<s%>.
Great <S%H7227>men<s%> are not always <S%H2449>wise<s%>: neither do the <S%H2205>aged<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
Therefore I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to <S%H2331>me<s%>; I also will show my <S%H1843>opinion<s%>.
<S%H3176>Behold<s%>, I waited for your <S%H1697>words<s%>; I gave <S%H238>ear<s%> to your <S%H8394>reasons<s%>, while you searched <S%H2713>out<s%> what to <S%H4405>say<s%>.
<S%H995>Yes<s%>, I attended unto <S%H3198>you<s%>, and, behold, there was none of you that convinced <S%H347>Job<s%>, or that <S%H6030>answered<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%>:
Lest you should <S%H559>say<s%>, We have found <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: <S%H410>God<s%> thrusts him <S%H5086>down<s%>, not <S%H376>man<s%>.
Now he has not <S%H6186>directed<s%> his <S%H4405>words<s%> against <S%H7725>me<s%>: neither will I answer him with your <S%H561>speeches<s%>.
They were <S%H2865>amazed<s%>, they <S%H6030>answered<s%> no <S%H6275>more<s%>: they left off <S%H4405>speaking<s%>.
When I had <S%H3176>waited<s%>, (for they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5975>not<s%>, but stood still, and answered no <S%H6030>more<s%>;)
I <S%H6030>said<s%>, I will answer also my <S%H2506>part<s%>, I also will <S%H2331>show<s%> my <S%H1843>opinion<s%>.
For I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4405>words<s%>, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H990>inside<s%> me constrains <S%H6693>me<s%>.
<S%H990>Behold<s%>, my belly is as <S%H3196>wine<s%> which has no <S%H6605>vent<s%>; it is ready to <S%H1234>burst<s%> like <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H178>bottles<s%>.
I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>, that I may be <S%H7304>refreshed<s%>: I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%>.
Let me <S%H5375>not<s%>, I pray you, accept any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H6440>person<s%>, neither let me give flattering <S%H3655>titles<s%> unto <S%H120>man<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> not to give flattering <S%H3655>titles<s%>; in so doing my <S%H6213>maker<s%> would <S%H4592>soon<s%> take me <S%H5375>away<s%>.
